text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's finally time for the monumental<n>end-of-year race, the
Arima Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Fans are excited for today's sisterly<n>showdown. Ever
since their last<n>matchup fell through, we've been<n>waiting
to see Biwa Hayahide versus<n>Narita Brian!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The stands are packed! This is the<n>race that no one wants
to miss!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: What a profound feeling to have<n>finally made it to this day.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I've been waiting for this a long<n>time.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I've completed my winning equation.<n>Don't think I'll
concede this race just<n>because you're my sister.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You're always overthinking things.<n>Our race isn't that
complicated.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Heheh, true enough. We've been<n>destined for this since we
were kids.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Shall we go resolve our little sibling<n>rivalry?
